item.text: Therefore you are without excuse, whoever you are, when you judge someone else. For on whatever grounds you judge another, you condemn yourself, because you who judge practice the same things.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> we <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="2917" class="">judgment</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="225" class="">in accordance with</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">against</st> those who <st data-num="4238" class="">practice</st> <st data-num="5108">such things</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> do you <st data-num="3049" class="">think</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="444" class="">whoever</st> you are, when you <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st><n id="2" /> those who <st data-num="4238" class="">practice</st> <st data-num="5108">such things</st> <st data-num="2532">and yet</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">yourself</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you will <st data-num="1628" class="">escape</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="2917" class="">judgment</st>?

<st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> do you have <st data-num="2706" class="">contempt</st> for the <st data-num="4149" class="">wealth</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5543" class="">kindness</st>, <st data-num="463" class="">forbearance</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3115" class="">patience</st>, and yet do <st data-num="50">not know</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="5543" class="">kindness</st> <st data-num="71" class="">leads</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3341" class="">repentance</st>?

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">because of</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4643" class="">stubbornness</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> your <st data-num="279" class="">unrepentant</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>, you are <st data-num="2343">storing up</st> <st data-num="3709" class="">wrath</st> for <st data-num="4572" class="">yourselves</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3709" class="">wrath</st>, when <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="1341">righteous judgment</st> is <st data-num="602" class="">revealed</st>!<n id="2" />
He will reward each one according to his works:

<st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st> to those who <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st> <st data-num="5281" class="">perseverance</st> in <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> <st data-num="2212" class="">seek</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5092" class="">honor</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="861" class="">immortality</st>,

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3709" class="">wrath</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2372" class="">anger</st> to those who live <st data-num="1537" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2052">selfish ambition</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> do <st data-num="544">not obey</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3982" class="">follow</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="93" class="">unrighteousness</st>.

There will be<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2347" class="">affliction</st> <st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4730" class="">distress</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3956 5590">everyone</st><n id="2" /> who <st data-num="2716" class="">does</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">evil</st>, on the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jew</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st> <st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> the <st data-num="1672" class="">Greek</st>,<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">but</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5092" class="">honor</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st> for <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> who <st data-num="2038" class="">does</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st>, for the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jew</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5037" class="">also</st> the <st data-num="1672" class="">Greek</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4382" class="">partiality</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">with</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">all</st> who have <st data-num="264" class="">sinned</st> <st data-num="460">apart from the law</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="622" class="">perish</st> <st data-num="460">apart from the law</st>, <st data-num="2532">and</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">all</st> who have <st data-num="264" class="">sinned</st> <st data-num="1722">under</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> will be <st data-num="2919" class="">judged</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> it is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> those who <st data-num="202" class="">hear</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> who are <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> those who <st data-num="4163" class="">do</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> will be <st data-num="1344" class="">declared righteous</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">whenever</st> the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles</st>,<n id="1" /> who do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>, <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> by <st data-num="5449" class="">nature</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="3588">things</st> required by the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> who <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> a <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> to <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st>.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1731" class="">show</st> that the <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st> of the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> is <st data-num="1123" class="">written</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">hearts</st>, as <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st> <st data-num="4828">bears witness</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3342 240">conflicting</st> <st data-num="3053" class="">thoughts</st> <st data-num="2723" class="">accuse</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">else</st> <st data-num="626" class="">defend</st><n id="3" /> them,<n id="4" />
on the day when God will judge the secrets of human hearts, according to my gospel through Christ Jesus.
But if you call yourself a Jew and rely on the law and boast of your relationship to God

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> his <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1381" class="">approve</st> the <st data-num="1308">superior things</st> because you <st data-num="2727">receive instruction</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>,<n id="2" />

<st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> if you are <st data-num="3982" class="">convinced</st><n id="1" /> that you <st data-num="4572" class="">yourself</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> a <st data-num="3595" class="">guide</st> to the <st data-num="5185" class="">blind</st>, a <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> to those who are <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4655" class="">darkness</st>,

an <st data-num="3810" class="">educator</st> of the <st data-num="878" class="">senseless</st>, a <st data-num="1320" class="">teacher</st> of <st data-num="3516">little children</st>, because you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> the <st data-num="3446">essential features</st> of <st data-num="1108" class="">knowledge</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> of the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>—

<st data-num="3767" class="">therefore</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1321" class="">you</st> who <st data-num="1321" class="">teach</st> <st data-num="2087">someone else</st>, do you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1321" class="">teach</st> <st data-num="4572" class="">yourself</st>? You who <st data-num="2784" class="">preach</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">against</st> <st data-num="2813" class="">stealing</st>, do <st data-num="1321" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2813" class="">steal</st>?

You who <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> others <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="3431" class="">commit adultery</st>, do you <st data-num="3431">commit adultery</st>? You who <st data-num="948" class="">abhor</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1497" class="">idols</st>, do you <st data-num="2416">rob temples</st>?

You <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="2744" class="">boast</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="818" class="">dishonor</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3847" class="">transgressing</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>!
For just as it is written, “the name of God is being blasphemed among the Gentiles because of you.”
For circumcision has its value if you practice the law, but if you break the law, your circumcision has become uncircumcision.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="203" class="">uncircumcised man</st> <st data-num="5442" class="">obeys</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1345">righteous requirements</st> of the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>, will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="203" class="">uncircumcision</st> be <st data-num="3049" class="">regarded</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">as</st> <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcision</st>?

And the <st data-num="5449" class="">physically</st> <st data-num="203" class="">uncircumcised man</st>,<n id="1" /> by <st data-num="5055">keeping</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>, will <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> to be the <st data-num="3848">transgressor</st> of the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>, <st data-num="1223" class="">even though</st><n id="2" /> you have the <st data-num="1121">letter</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcision</st>!

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> a person <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> a <st data-num="2453" class="">Jew</st> who is one <st data-num="5318" class="">outwardly</st>, <st data-num="3761" class="">nor</st> is <st data-num="4061" class="">circumcision</st> something that is <st data-num="5318" class="">outward</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st>,
but someone is a Jew who is one inwardly, and circumcision is of the heart by the Spirit and not by the letter. This person’s praise is not from people but from God.
